body:
# Simple Implemantation of flash helicopter game
JHelicopter has been implemented in Javafx 2.0.3. It is simple side scrolling game.

ScreenShots
![Opening Screen of application](http://i46.tinypic.com/2e5iaab.png) Opening Screen of application
![Main Game Screen](http://i46.tinypic.com/692ttg.png) Main Game Screen
![Game Pause](http://i48.tinypic.com/2a66lgg.png) Game Pause
![Final Screen display your score after collision](http://i47.tinypic.com/2808m4y.png) Final Screen display your score after collision
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Jhelicopter
